name: Top Racer Collection
description:
The thrill of 16-bit racing from the 90s is back! Play the complete Top Racer series with Top Racer, Top Racer 2, Top Racer 3000 and Top Racer Crossroads, a brand new game with new cars and exclusive content made especially for this unmissable edition. Go back in time and travel to the future for the pure nostalgia of racing at breakneck speeds.

  • Arcade gameplay where it's all about floor it and quick reflexes!
  • 4 games combined in a single title!
  • Over 140 tracks around the world and beyond!
  • 4 new incredible and exclusive cars in Top Racer Crossroads!




Manage your time, nitro and fuel just like in the original Top Racer, but this time with exclusive cars! There are 4 cars for you to experience for the first time!






Reminisce about the old split-screen days and play games to see who's king of the track!
  • 2 players in Top Racer, Top Racer 2 and Top Racer Crossroads
  • Up to 4 simultaneous players in Top Racer 3000
  • Challenge racers anywhere on the planet in online mode to enter the world rankings!

Get in the mood for 90s games by using filters reminiscent of images from old TV sets!

Relive the experience with colorful and vibrant pixel graphics just like in the original games!






  • Race in campaign mode on the 140 tracks available!
  • Race against the clock in time attack mode!
  • Have fun without compromise in quick race mode!






In Custom Cup mode you're the king of the show and you can choose 4 tracks in any of the games to set the challenge for everyone.




Play again or experience for the first time the series of racing games from the 90s that many old-school racers miss.



Play the original TOP RACER with exclusive new cars that make reference to vehicles that are symbols of other great racing games and even popular Brazilian car culture.



The first game in the series was released in 1992 for the SNES and left a legion of fans, especially in Brazil and Latin America. In the best arcade style, choose between 4 different cars inspired by real sports cars and race on 32 tracks, opting for manual or automatic gear changes and using nitro boosts for those times when you're in a pinch.



The second game in the series, released in 1993, also for the SNES, considered by many players to be an even more incredible sequel to the first game. This time, with a more realistic feel, you have to control the damage to your car, collect resources, make upgrades for greater performance and keep an eye on the weather to change the tires! There are 64 tracks to show off your skill and strategy.



Released in 1995, Top Gear 3000 brings a different and completely mind-blowing experience at unthinkable and challenging speeds. A thousand years in the future, you'll race on 47 tracks on different planets in an interplanetary competition! You can count on hyper-technological upgrades such as nuclear fusion engines and titanium-cobalt armor. You can also use weapons to improve your strategy, such as jumping over your opponents or using a magnet to slow down the cars in front of you!
